topic: Structural characteristics, catalytic advantages, and incorporation methods of B-based materials with 3-D dispersed active sites in porous frameworks for enhanced catalytic applications
QuestionEnglish: Analyze the structural characteristics of B-based materials with 3-D dispersed active sites in porous frameworks, explaining how these features enhance catalytic performance, and critically evaluate the methods used to incorporate B active components into these structures, discussing their relative effectiveness for different catalytic applications.
QuestionChinese: 分析具有三维分散活性位点的多孔框架硼基材料的结构特征，解释这些特征如何增强催化性能，并批判性地评估将硼活性组分引入这些结构的方法，讨论它们对不同催化应用的相对有效性。
